Description:
Make me your home !
This wonderful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom property features a sleek sense of design and style that flow effortlessly throughout the layout. A soft neutral colour palette is complemented by the warmth of the timber style flooring to create the perfect contemporary family home.
Set to impress from your first glimpse, the landscaped gardens and modern facade greet you from the street. Light and bright throughout, the home begins with a tranquil master bedroom, including walk in robe and private ensuite, and continues with two central living zones; a formal living room and a casual, open plan kitchen, meals and family area. In the stylish kitchen, stainless steel appliances are paired with stone benchtops, tiled splashbacks and a long breakfast bar ideal for busy families and social home chefs.
Completing the floor plan are two additional bedrooms with robes, a family bathroom, separate WC, laundry and double garage with convenient internal access. Ducted heating, a reverse cycle air conditioner, roller blinds and tinted windows are just some of the appealing extras you'll love in this ready to move straight in home.
Head outdoors to find neatly landscaped gardens with a grassed area for kids and pets to play as well as a large pergola perfect for extended entertaining, family barbeques or relaxing with your favourite beverage.
Across the road from Living Family and Community Centre, close to parks and recreation options including Casey RACE and Casey Fields, only minutes to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Primary School and Casey Grammar plus within easy access of the South Gippsland Highway, it is the perfect choice for first home buyers, families and investors.
If you value family entertainment, education and recreation, then call us today for a tour of this impeccable property.
